What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, antiquities boss Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks try to extinguish the blaze in the NDP headquarters. The Star newspaper reported Thursday that Nelson Mandela had been seen by a lung specialist at the private hospital. He has been admitted for investigation, the doctor, Michael Gove Plit, told the newspaper. He declined to comment on Nelson Mandela 's condition. Eric Schmidt , who has led Google since 2001, will take on the new role on April 4, working mostly on external operations, including deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership.
